effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 783,920 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 316,543.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Holy Shock's healing is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 10%.
(4) Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

(4) Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,592 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 173 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 1.6 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
